All Classes

Class Description
AuthenticationResource
Authentication resource (exposed at "authentication" path) which allow a user to generate a token if it is credential are good and therefore allow the use of resources with the Authorize annotation
AuthenticationService
Class Singleton which contains all the logic linked to the Authentication resource.
Authorize
A annotation that binds to a filter.
AuthorizeFilter
This class is a filter and check the request headers.
CheckUtils
CheckUtils(Singleton pattern)Contains all the methods for checking parameters through the FlopBox API
Command
Represents the commands implemented on the FlopBox Application
Constant
Constant(Singleton pattern) contains all the constants used through the flopBox API
Credentials
Class which represents the identifiers of a user of the flopbox platform, in order to allow him to modify / add / delete servers available on the platform
ErrorResponse
Class which represents an error message sent to the client when the server cannot respond to the request.
FtpResource
Ftp resource (exposed at "{alias}" path) which allows anyone to access the ftp server registered on the flopBox platform and to perform operations specific to the ftp protocol
FtpService
Class which contains all the logic linked to the ftp resource.
HandleException
HandleException(Singleton pattern) used to handle major exceptions / error code with custom messages in a centralized location.
JwtToken
Class which represents a jwt token
JwtTokenService
the JwtTokenService (Singleton pattern) class is in charge of parsing the token into credentials object and generating the token from the credentials object.
Main
Application entry point
NotAuthorizedException
Exception throw when the request has not been applied because it lacks valid authentication credentials for the target resource.
Server
Class which represents a Server, it is characterized by an alias (to access it), an address (ip address) and a port (port on which the server listens)
ServerResource
Server resource (exposed at "server" path) which allow to get all (GET), get (GET), create (POST), update( PUT) and delete (DELETE) a server
ServerService
Class Singleton which contains all the logic linked to the Server resource used to perform CRUD operations.
UnexpectedFtpStatusCodeException
Exception throw when an unexpected status code is sent by the ftp server
